Detailed Description

Helper for parsing program options.

For helping parse all those pesky program options!

Author:
John LaRusic

Definition in file options.c.

Parses program options.

Parameters:
num_opts [in] the number of program options
options [out] array of program options
description [in] description of program
usage [in] usage message
argc [in] number of program arguments
argv [out] array of program arguments (might be rearranged)
opt_ind [out] index first program option appears at
